reviewText: This is a wonderful video.  The training is very gentle and sweet.  My 9 year old daughter who is interested in horses loved this video.
This excellent and well-done video is both instructional and informative. It provides excellent information to a horse owner as they begin training their Chincoteague pony. Highly recommend!
You will all like this video.  Shows step by step of Chincoteague Pony Training.

This video is very informative and easy watching.
For the whole family.
